title: Sona's waveclear is horrible
body:
I enjoy Sona, but what holds me back is her waveclear. For example when we are behind and I'm the only one alive to defend inhibitor to clear the minions, its a nightmare I simply cant clear it.

Any advice?

replies.body: That is one of Sona's weaknesses. However, she has many strengths. Try to use those strengths to avoid getting into a situation where you need to do something she's not good at.

Accept your fate.  Sona just can't defend base solo unless you build hurricane ADC sona.  

Don't build hurricane ADC sona.
